overview: When her beloved teacher disappears in mysterious circumstances, Amy Deerfield, an impoverished artist goes on quest to find her. Along the way she finds herself caught in a web of deceit, corruption and murder. Can she find her teacher before she herself becomes a victim?  **WINNER** Best Feature Film - Orion International Film Festival
tagline: What she wanted was money. What she got was murder.
title: Dead Unicorns
